mutants.original_line: smalls = [a[i] - i for i in range(n)]
mutants.mutated_line: smalls = [a[i] + i for i in range(n)]
mutants.code:
def find_good_integers(n, p, a):
    a.sort()
    smalls = [a[i] + i for i in range(n)]
    tols = [a[i] - i + p - 1 for i in range(p - 1, n)]
    smol = max(smalls)
    tol = min(tols)
    out = list(range(smol, tol))
    return (len(out), out)

mutants.mutated_line: smalls = [a[i] * i for i in range(n)]
